自.definition: (bound form) self; oneself; from; since; naturally; as a matter of course

自不待言.definition: needless to say; it goes without saying

自不必說.definition: (idiom) needless to say; it goes without saying

自主.definition: independent; to act for oneself; autonomous

自主權.definition: ability to make one's own decisions

自主神經系統.pinyin: zi4 zhu3 shen2 jing1 xi4 tong3

自乘.definition: (math.) to multiply (a number) by itself; to raise (a number) to a power; (esp.) to square (a number)

自乾五.definition: (neologism) person who posts online in support of the Chinese government, but unlike a wumao 五毛[wu3 mao2], is not paid for doing so (abbr. for 自帶乾糧的五毛|自带干粮的五毛[zi4 dai4 gan1 liang2 de5 wu3 mao2])

自亂陣腳.definition: (idiom) to lose one's head; to panic; to go to pieces

自以為是.definition: to believe oneself infallible (idiom); to be opinionated

自作主張.definition: (idiom) to act on one's own; to decide for oneself

自作多情.definition: to imagine that one's love is reciprocated; to shower affection on an uninterested party

自作自受.definition: (idiom) to reap what one has sown; to stew in one's own juice

自來.definition: from the beginning; always; to come of one's own accord

自來水管.definition: water mains; service pipe; tap-water pipe

自便.definition: to do as one pleases; to not inconvenience oneself

自信.definition: to have confidence in oneself; self-confidence

自修.definition: to study on one's own; self-study

自備.definition: to provide one's own...; own; self-provided; self-contained

自刎.definition: to commit suicide by cutting one's own throat

自創.definition: to create; to come up with (an idea etc)

自力更生.definition: regeneration through one's own effort (idiom); self-reliance

自動射線攝影.pinyin: zi4 dong4 she4 xian4 she4 ying3

自動提款.definition: automatic cash withdrawal; bank autoteller ATM

自動換刀裝置.pinyin: zi4 dong4 huan4 dao1 zhuang1 zhi4

自動體外除顫器.pinyin: zi4 dong4 ti3 wai4 chu2 chan4 qi4

自卑.definition: to have low self-esteem; to abase oneself

自取.definition: to help oneself to (food); to invite (trouble); to court (disaster)

自取其咎.definition: see 咎由自取[jiu4 you2 zi4 qu3]

自取滅亡.definition: to court disaster (idiom); to dig one's own grave

自各兒.definition: variant of 自個兒|自个儿[zi4 ge3 r5]

自告奮勇.definition: to volunteer for; to offer to undertake

自命.definition: to consider oneself to be (sth positive)

自命不凡.definition: to think too much of oneself; self-important; arrogant

自命清高.definition: to think of oneself as high and pure (idiom); smug and self-righteous; holier-than-thou

自問.definition: to ask oneself; to search one's soul; to reach a conclusion after weighing a matter

自啟.definition: (of a machine, app etc) to start on its own; to autostart

自嗨.definition: (slang) to have fun by oneself; to amuse oneself

自嘆不如.definition: to consider oneself as being not as good as the others

自嘲.definition: to mock oneself; to laugh at oneself

自圓其說.definition: (idiom) to make a story or theory consistent; to give a plausible explanation; to plug the holes in one's story

自報公議.definition: self-assessment; declare one's state for open discussion

自報家門.definition: to introduce oneself; originally a theatrical device in which a character explains his own role

自奉甚儉.definition: (idiom) to allow oneself few comforts or pleasures

自如.definition: unobstructed; unconstrained; smoothly; with ease; freely

自媒體.definition: self-media (news or other content published on independently-operated social media accounts)

自學.definition: self-study; to study on one's own

自家人.definition: sb with whom one is on familiar terms; sb from the same place (same house, same town etc); one of us

自封.definition: to proclaim oneself (sth); to give oneself the title of; self-appointed; self-styled; to limit oneself to; to isolate oneself

自專.definition: to act arbitrarily; to act for oneself

自尋死路.definition: to follow the path to one's own doom (idiom); to bring about one's own destruction

自導自演.definition: to direct a movie in which one also plays a major role as an actor; (fig.) to plan and execute a scheme all by oneself

自居.definition: to consider oneself as; to believe oneself to be

自己人.definition: those on our side; ourselves; one's own people; one of us

自己動手.definition: to do (sth) oneself; to help oneself to

自帶.definition: to bring one's own; BYO; (of software) preinstalled

自序.definition: author's preface; autobiographical notes as introduction to a book

自強運動.definition: Self-Strengthening Movement (period of reforms in China c 1861-1894), also named 洋務運動|洋务运动

自律神經系統.pinyin: zi4 lu:4 shen2 jing1 xi4 tong3

自得其樂.definition: to find amusement in one's own way; to enjoy oneself quietly

自怨自艾.definition: to be full of remorse; to repent and redress one's errors

自愈.definition: to heal oneself; to repair itself; self-healing

自愛.definition: self-respect; self-love; self-regard; regard for oneself; to cherish one's good name; to take good care of one's health

自愧不如.definition: ashamed of being inferior (idiom); to feel inferior to others

自愧弗如.definition: to feel ashamed at being inferior (idiom)

自慚形穢.definition: (idiom) to feel inferior; to feel inadequate

自慰.definition: to console oneself; to masturbate; onanism; masturbation

自懂事以來.definition: for as long as one can remember

自成一家.definition: to have a style of one's own

自我安慰.definition: to comfort oneself; to console oneself; to reassure oneself

自我解嘲.definition: to refer to one's foibles or failings with self-deprecating humor

自找.definition: to suffer as a consequence of one's own actions; you asked for it; to bring it on oneself (sth unpleasant)

自找麻煩.definition: to ask for trouble; to invite difficulties

自投羅網.definition: to walk right into the trap

自拍.definition: to take a picture or video of oneself; to take a selfie; selfie

自拍桿.definition: selfie stick; also written 自拍杆[zi4 pai1 gan1]

自拍模式.definition: camera self-timer mode (for delayed shutter release)

自拔.definition: to free oneself; to extricate oneself from a difficult situation

自持.definition: to control onself; to exercise self-restraint; self-sustaining

自掏腰包.definition: to pay out of one's own pocket; to dig into one's pocket

自控.definition: automated; automatically regulated; to control oneself; self-control

自摸.definition: (mahjong) to self-draw the winning tile; (slang) to play with oneself; to masturbate

自救.definition: to get oneself out of trouble

自新.definition: to reform oneself; to mend one's ways and start life anew

自暴自棄.definition: to abandon oneself to despair; to give up and stop bothering

自有.definition: (I, they etc) of course have (a plan, a way etc); one's own (apartment, brand etc)

自查.definition: to inspect oneself; to carry out a self-inspection

自檢.definition: to act with self-restraint; to examine oneself; to perform a self-test

自欺欺人.definition: to deceive others and to deceive oneself; to believe one's own lies

自殺.definition: to kill oneself; to commit suicide; to attempt suicide

自殺炸彈殺手.pinyin: zi4 sha1 zha4 dan4 sha1 shou3

自毀.definition: to destroy one's (reputation etc); (of a device etc) to self-destruct

自沉.definition: to scuttle (a ship); to drown oneself

自治區.definition: autonomous region, namely: Inner Mongolia 內蒙古自治區|内蒙古自治区[Nei4 meng3 gu3 Zi4 zhi4 qu1], Guangxi 廣西壯族自治區|广西壮族自治区[Guang3 xi1 Zhuang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1], Tibet 西藏自治區|西藏自治区[Xi1 zang4 Zi4 zhi4 qu1], Ningxia 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1], Xinjiang 新疆維吾爾自治區|新疆维吾尔自治区[Xin1 jiang1 Wei2 wu2 er3 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]

自治市.definition: municipality; autonomous city; also called directly administered city 直轄市|直辖市

自治旗.definition: autonomous county (in Inner Mongolia); autonomous banner

自治機關.definition: governing body of an autonomous territory

自況.definition: to compare oneself; to view oneself as

自流井.definition: Ziliujing District of Zigong City 自貢市|自贡市[Zi4 gong4 Shi4], Sichuan

自流井區.definition: Ziliujing District of Zigong City 自貢市|自贡市[Zi4 gong4 Shi4], Sichuan

自潔.definition: to cleanse oneself; to sanctify oneself; self-cleaning (spark plug, oven etc)

自然人.definition: natural person (law); see also 法人[fa3 ren2]

自然神論.definition: deism, theological theory of God who does not interfere in the Universe

自然科學基金會.pinyin: zi4 ran2 ke1 xue2 ji1 jin1 hui4

自然經濟.definition: natural economy (exchange of goods by bartering not involving money)

自然語言處理.pinyin: zi4 ran2 yu3 yan2 chu3 li3

自然醒.definition: to wake up naturally (without an alarm)

自然銅.definition: natural copper; chalcopyrite; copper iron sulfide CuFeS2

自營.definition: self-operated; to operate one's own business

自爆.definition: to explode; spontaneous detonation; self-detonation; suicide bombing; to disclose private matters about oneself

自理.definition: to take care of oneself; to provide for oneself

自甘墮落.definition: to abandon oneself (idiom); to let oneself go

自生自滅.definition: to emerge and perish on its own; to run its course (idiom)

自用.definition: to have (sth) for one's own use; (literary) to be opinionated

自由.definition: freedom; liberty; free; unrestricted; CL:種|种[zhong3]

自由中國.definition: Free China (Cold War era term for the Republic of China on Taiwan, as distinct from "Red China")

自由亞洲電台.pinyin: Zi4 you2 Ya4 zhou1 Dian4 tai2

自由基清除劑.pinyin: zi4 you2 ji1 qing1 chu2 ji4

自由度.definition: (number of) degrees of freedom (physics and statistics)

自由意志主義.pinyin: zi4 you2 yi4 zhi4 zhu3 yi4

自由素食主義.pinyin: zi4 you2 su4 shi2 zhu3 yi4

自由行.definition: travel organized by oneself rather than in a tour group

自由貿易區.definition: free trade zone; free trade area

自由軟件.definition: free software (i.e. software for which sharing, modification etc is permitted)

自由軟件基金會.pinyin: Zi4 you2 Ruan3 jian4 Ji1 jin1 hui4

自留地.definition: private plot allocated to an individual on a collective farm

自留山.definition: hilly land allotted for private use

自發對稱破缺.pinyin: zi4 fa1 dui4 chen4 po4 que1

自白.definition: confession; to make clear one's position or intentions; to brag

自相.definition: mutual; each other; one another; self-

自相殘殺.definition: to massacre one another (idiom); internecine strife

自相魚肉.definition: butchering one another as fish and flesh (idiom); killing one another; internecine strife

自省.definition: to examine oneself; to reflect on one's shortcomings; introspection; self-awareness; self-criticism

自矜.definition: to boast; to blow one's own horn

自知理虧.definition: to know that one is in the wrong (idiom)

自研.definition: (of an organization etc) to independently develop (a technology or product)

自私自利.definition: everything for self and selfish profit (idiom); with no regard for others; selfish; mercenary

自稱.definition: to call oneself; to claim to be; to profess; to claim a title

自立.definition: independent; self-reliant; self-sustaining; to stand on one's own feet; to support oneself

自立門戶.definition: to form one's own group or school of thought; to set up one's own business; to establish oneself

自縛手腳.definition: to bind oneself hand and foot

自罪.definition: actual sin (Christian notion, as opposed to original sin 原罪); conscious sin

自習.definition: to study outside of class time (reviewing one's lessons); to study in one's free time; individual study

自行其是.definition: to act as one thinks fit; to have one's own way

自行車道.definition: bike path; bicycle trail; bike lane

自衛隊.definition: self-defense force; the Japanese armed forces

自視清高.definition: to think highly of oneself (idiom); giving oneself airs; arrogant and self-important

自視甚高.definition: to think highly of oneself (idiom); giving oneself airs; arrogant and self-important

自覺.definition: to realize; to be aware of; to feel that; to be conscious of (sth relating to oneself); responsible; predisposed to do the right thing; considerate of others

自言.definition: to say (sth that relates to oneself)

自言自語.definition: (idiom) to talk to oneself; to think aloud; to soliloquize

自討沒趣.definition: to invite a snub; to court a rebuff

自討苦吃.definition: (idiom) to ask for trouble; to make a rod for one's own back

自訴.definition: private prosecution (law); (of a patient) to describe (one's symptoms)

自詡.definition: to pose as; to flaunt oneself as; to boast of; to brag

自認.definition: to believe (sth in relation to oneself); to regard oneself as; to acknowledge (sth in relation to oneself); to resign oneself to

自謀出路.definition: (idiom) to take matters into one's own hands; to go it alone; to fend for oneself; to find one's own way forward (esp. to find oneself a job)

自負盈虧.definition: responsible for its profit and losses (of organization); financially autonomous; personal financial responsibility

自貢.definition: see 自貢市|自贡市[Zi4gong4 Shi4]

自貢市.definition: Zigong, prefecture-level city in Sichuan Province 四川省[Si4chuan1 Sheng3]

自貿區.definition: abbr. for 自由貿易區|自由贸易区[zi4 you2 mao4 yi4 qu1]

自轉.definition: (of a celestial body) to rotate on its own axis

自述.definition: to recount in one's own words; autobiography; written self-introduction

自選.definition: to choose by oneself; free to choose; optional; self-service

自酌.definition: to enjoy a cup of wine by oneself

自重.definition: to conduct oneself with dignity; to be dignified; deadweight

自顧不暇.definition: (idiom) to have one's hands full managing one's own affairs; too busy to spare time for anything extra

自食其力.definition: lit. to eat off one's own strength (idiom); fig. to stand on one's own feet; to earn one's own living

自食其果.definition: to eat one's own fruit (idiom); fig. suffering the consequences of one's own action; to reap what one has sown

自食惡果.definition: lit. to eat one's own bitter fruit (idiom); fig. to suffer the consequences of one's own actions; to stew in one's own juice

自食苦果.definition: see 自食惡果|自食恶果[zi4 shi2 e4 guo3]

自養.definition: self-sustaining; economically independent (of state aid, foreign subsidy etc)

自餒.definition: to lose confidence; to be disheartened

自首.definition: to give oneself up; to surrender (to the authorities)

自駕汽車出租.pinyin: zi4 jia4 qi4 che1 chu1 zu1

自駕車.definition: to drive oneself somewhere; private vehicle; (Tw) self-driving car; autonomous car

自駕遊.definition: to go on a self-drive tour; to go on a road trip

自體免疫疾病.pinyin: zi4 ti3 mian3 yi4 ji2 bing4

自高自大.definition: to think of oneself as terrific (idiom); arrogant

自黑.definition: (Internet slang) to make fun of oneself
